Text.Value: Stay here. Be still.
Tell me more about this place.
*Shaking with the goddess' fury, the spider shrieks, then attacks.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Large Giant Spider] rears up ready to attack <River>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: |SCRIPTER: Spiders are hostile to the player. The player is NOT caught in a web.|

Text.Value: *It hadn't occurred to you that Lolth might be listening.*
*She scuttles toward you, drooling.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Large Giant Spider] moves agressively towards player <River>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: |SCRIPTER: Spiders are hostile to the player. The player is NOT caught in a web.|

Text.Value: *Ssssss.*
Leave.
*She looks to the closed door, drooling.*
Yes, my desire. Closer, my sweet!

EditorData.NodeContext: Excited, drooling with desire to eat us.

Text.Value: How dare you. Do you not recognise me? Lolth, Queen of Spiders.
Kill the goblins. They displease me.
You must open the door.
*Suddenly, a suffocating wave of divine rage surges through the spider pit.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Large Giant Spider] and [Second Spider] react to wave of rage <River>

Text.Value: Delicious - I do not know. But cruel and sharp - yes. Bindable and wrappable and biteable - yes.

EditorData.NodeContext: delighted, preparing to escape and feast on goblins who have held it captive

Text.Value: Yes, my queen.

EditorData.NodeContext: obedient and in awe, thinking she's speaking to her goddess

Text.Value: Freedom.
*The spider seems poised to attack, but she hesitates, tapping her claws as if trying to communicate.*
Stay here for now.
*Ssssk.*
I will wrap you, and bind you, and bite you, and eat you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Excited, almost to herself, thinking about how she'll eat us

Text.Value: There is another drow here, but she has forgotten you, my queen. She is forsaken.

EditorData.NodeContext: describing a blasphemy - thinks she's speaking to her goddess

Text.Value: Attack.
Lolth? Is it... you? My queen! My queen of biting. My queen of binding. My queen of wrapping and holding. What would you have me do?

EditorData.NodeContext: Lolth is her goddess. We just tricked her into thinking we ARE that goddess so she's in awe. The second L on 'lolth' isn't silent. The O can be long (lowlth) or short (lawlth

Text.Value: You should eat a goblin instead. They're delicious.
Usher her toward the door.
Clap your hands together, mimicking her movements.
*The sound and your movement agitate her. She prepares to strike.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: MimicGiantSpider_Failure, [Large Giant Spider] rears up ready to attack <River>

Text.Value: Gone, spoiled meat. Gone from here.

EditorData.NodeContext: disgusted, wanted to eat us but thinks we're poisoned

Text.Value: *The spider relaxes slightly, but you feel her hunger - and fear - beneath the surface.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: MimicGiantSpider_Success *DUPE* [Large Giant Spider] Spider hisses - relaxed <River>

Text.Value: Lolth? Can it be?

EditorData.NodeContext: Confused - Lolth is her goddess. For Lolth - the second L isn't silent. The O can be long (lowlth) or short (lawlth

Text.Value: You'd get sick if you ate me. I carry a strange curse.
Kill the goblins.
*She scuttles toward the door.*
*The other spider echoes her.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *The other spider echoed her, tapping his claws gleefully.*
EditorData.SFXTags: [Second Spider] tapps claws on the groud happily and hisses

Text.Value: *The spider hisses and attacks.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Large Giant Spider] rears up ready to attack <River>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: |SCRIPTER: Combat with the spiders begins. Player is not caught in a web.|

Text.Value: Open the door so I can do your bidding.

EditorData.NodeContext: eager and in awe, thinks she's speaking to her goddess

Text.Value: Of course, my queen.

EditorData.NodeContext: obedient and in awe, thinking she's speaking to her goddess

Text.Value: I do not get sick. I wrap. I bind. I bite. I eat.
Their blood will sicken from my bite.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: |SCRIPTER: Spiders are friendly to player. They leave the pit to attack the goblins.|
EditorData.NodeContext: malicious and delighted as she prepares to leave and eat her captors

Text.Value: I see your sickness. A poison in the skull. Do not touch me, do not come close.
*Skreeee!*
More delicious than you? More bindable? More wrappable? More biteable? No.

EditorData.NodeContext: considering the question, then a happy malicious 'no' as she prepares to eat us

Text.Value: What would you have me do?

EditorData.NodeContext: obedience and awe, thinking she's speaking ot her goddess

Synopsis: Non-critpath. Two giant spiders trap the player. The one that shoots the web is female. Her companion is her brother.  The player has a chance to convince the spiders they are friendly, setting the spiders loose on the goblins in the camp above.
